jobDescription: Solution Architect - Data Science (Python/R)  If you are a talented Solution Architect with 3+ years of professional experience with Python or R, please read on!  Based in the tech center of Mountain View, CA we are a cutting edge machine learning company creating a product that will automate machine learning. Specializing in providing the most high tech and usable software; we set ourselves apart by being consumer focused and wanting to bring ML to the masses!  We are looking to add a highly motivated and experienced Python Solution Architect to our team to continue developing our platform as it grows beyond our dreams!  If you are interested in joining an expanding yet close knit company that provides full access to the hottest in machine learning advancements in the tech heart of California, then apply immediately. Top Reasons to Work with Us
